problems.title: Maximum XOR of Two Numbers in an Array (Bit Manipulation)
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given an integer array nums, return the maximum result of nums[i] XOR nums[j], where 0 <= i <= j < n.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
3 10 5 25 2 8

Sample Output
28

Explanation: The maximum result is 5 XOR 25 = 28.

Sample Input
14 70 53 83 49 91 36 80 92 51 66 70

Sample Output
127

Explanation: The maximum XOR result is 127.
hintsList: Use a Trie (prefix tree) to store binary representations of numbers.
For each number, try to find the number that gives maximum XOR by traversing the trie.
